title.rendered: A&A Associate CEO & Founder Opines about Emiratisation Targets in UAE

content.rendered:
Mr Robin Philip, A&A Associate CEO & Founder, gets featured in Gulf News speaking about the Emiratisation targets in UAE-based companies with 50+ skilled employees in real estate, hospitality, retail, and e-commerce industries outside of the traditional banking, semi-government and public sector (jobs). Organizations in the private sector would find it simpler to discover people through the UAE government’s ‘NAFIS’ program, which is creating a pool of individuals with the necessary credentials or who have undergone upskilling to achieve those levels. 

“Until a wider base of candidates is available, businesses are hiring citizens for HR roles as government liaisons. The Emiratisation initiative is only applicable to those firms with 50 or more employees. In such cases, these firms should raise their Emiratisation rate by 2 percent of overall skilled jobs.” said Robin Philip, Founder – Group CEO of A&A Associate.

excerpt.rendered: Good news for entrepreneurs in UAE – Attractive free zone offers to launch your business UAE free zones are …
